name: Snow Wars
summary:
GAME FEATURES:

Unique Snowy Arsenal:
Discover naturally-crafted weapons, including a slingshot, snow machine gun, snow shotgun, icy crossbow, and infinite snowballs. Each weapon's speed, power, and accuracy determine the damage it inflicts. Use in-game snow currency to collect power-ups like Speed Carrots, Invincibility Hot Chocolate, and Ice Spike Axes to enhance your gameplay.

Epic PvP Battles and Portal Defense Adventures:
Engage in epic PvP battles through Snow Wars VR's game modes.
